description: This file defines an interface for message bus operations within the ssp component, including function prototypes for engaging with the message bus, initialization, finalization, checking bus status, and resource cleanup.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_MessageBusEngage
methods.description: Function to engage/connect to the message bus with specified component ID, configuration file, and path.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_Initialize
methods.description: Function to initialize the message bus interface with provided user data.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_Finalize
methods.description: Function to finalize and clean up resources related to the message bus interface.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_Buscheck
methods.description: Function to check the status of the message bus.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_FreeResources
methods.description: Function to free resources with specified priority and user data.
